turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: good morning! I hope you had a nice weekend.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Good morning, mine was pretty great, how was yours?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: mine was hot! i am in florida.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Lucky, mine was stormy! Do you know what exactly we are supposed to be discussing in this chat? I'm a little lost.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: yes i do! have you ever heard about save the children charity?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No I have not, but I'm very interested, tell me more plase!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: it is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Ah alright, so in countries where it isn't as safe for children, this charity helps to defend and support them? What do they do to help?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They are essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc. They are a great organization. would you considering donating to them?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I would. I'm a mother myself, so children all over the world are very important to me. I'd like to donate my whole earnings from this HIT, which I suppose is $2 if I'm reading this correctly.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: so very generous of you! I will do the same. How old are your kids?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have a 6 year old daughter and a 2 year old daughter. My 6 year old just started 1st grade and she absolutely loves school... so being reminded that there's kids out there less fortunate just strikes my heart. I sure hope someday we can accomplish a safe well-being for all the children and innocent people in this world.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: i agree. That's nice to have daughters. hopefully they get along and look out for each other.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh they do! I'm so lucky to have 2 of them lol, because they are best friends now. Do you have kids?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: i have two kids. 6 year old girl and 9 year old boy. they fight now but i hope one day they resolve that get along!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Haha cute. I think that's just how it is with brothers and sisters. I think your daughter will be lucky one day though, having an older brother to protect her.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: that's what i am thinking. we might have another. it makes me sad that there isn't a little one anymore.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I definitely know the feeling. I mean, my 2 year old is currently in that "I\'m independent and not a baby anymore" stage lol when I swear just a week ago she was a snuggly baby. It break my heart when they grow up.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: i hear you. enjoy them while they are little!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will (: and good luck if you do end up having another! Family is beautiful.
